CustomField.description:
NICC-024063
***THIS FIELD IS DISPLAYED IN THE PARTNER COMMUNITY*** This field is automatically populated with the value from the Notes to Partners field on the Opportunity related to this Subscription Activation record
This field is automatically populated by the "AH_SubscriptionActivationTriggerHandler" Apex Class
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Important information for Amadeus Hospitality Partners
CustomField.label: Notes to Partners
